content.raw:
This doesn’t work for me. I got the following error:

```
Starting >>> ignition-launch
--- stderr: ignition-launch                                                                                                                            
CMake Error at /home/caguero/ignition_ws/install/ignition-cmake2/share/cmake/ignition-cmake2/cmake2/IgnConfigureBuild.cmake:140 (add_subdirectory):
  add_subdirectory given source "src" which is not an existing directory.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  CMakeLists.txt:46 (ign_configure_build)


---
Failed   <<< ignition-launch	[ Exited with code 1 ]
```
